charges.charge_description: 18:1029(b)(2); 18:1029(c); 18:982(a)(2)(B) Conspiracy to Commit Access Device Fraud; Forfeiture(1)

charges.charge_disposition: 32 Months Total Term of Imprisonment, consisting of 8 months on count one and a consecutive term of 24 months on count two; 3 Years Supervised Release as to count one and a concurrent term of 1 year on count two; $200.00 Special Assessment; $13,992.49 Restitution
